title: Gamification-Based Mathematics Problem-Solving Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics knowledge and practical application in work settings
context.additional_context: Real-time interaction and project-based assessment incorporating gamification elements in smartphone-based limited-technology settings

learning_goals: Learners can develop at least three customized math problem scenarios according to gamification design principles
Learners can measure changes in learning motivation after applying a gamification system with over 20% accuracy using self-assessment scales
Learners can derive strategies to improve team-based math problem-solving efficiency by at least 15% in gamification-based projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
